parameters.name: request_object_type
parameters.description: (string) The type of the request object. Can be one of the following: alerts, authorization, clusters, cluster-policies, dashboards, dbsql-dashboards, directories, experiments, files, instance-pools, jobs, notebooks, pipelines, queries, registered-models, repos, serving-endpoints, or warehouses.

parameters.name: request_object_id
parameters.description: (string) The id of the request object.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Gets the permissions of an object. Objects can inherit permissions from their parent objects or root object.
